response.original_title: "The Baron & The Junk Dealer" Animated Short
response.overview: Adapted from the comics of Connor Ratliff based on The George Lucas Talk Show Original Play, "The Baron & The Junk Dealer." (2 August - 24 August at Assembly Roxy Downstairs, part of the 2023 Edinburgh Festival Fringe).
response.title: "The Baron & The Junk Dealer" Animated Short
